description: The open() method uses check-then-unwrap pattern that could use entry API for cleaner code. Not a safety issue since we just inserted if not present.
title: git_worker.rs:78 unwrap can use entry API instead

description:
**Problem**
Wire serialization/parsing lacks property-level coverage. Corrupted or unexpected data could silently lose fields.

**Design**
Add proptest-based roundtrip tests:
- serialize_state/parse_state
- serialize_tombstones/parse_tombstones
- serialize_deps/parse_deps
- serialize_meta/parse_meta (including last_write_stamp optional)
Additionally test tolerant parsing of legacy/extra fields (if applicable).

**Acceptance**
- [ ] Roundtrip property tests added
- [ ] Meta last_write_stamp preserved
- [ ] Tests run fast in CI

**Files:** src/git/wire.rs, Cargo.toml
title: Wire format roundtrip + fuzz tests
